title: Deidentification-Report.Generate.Output
description: Output messageType for the Deidentification-Report.Generate capability.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated de-identification report.

summary.description: High-level summary of techniques applied, risk posture, and compliance alignment.

evidence.description: Evidence blocks supporting the de-identification assessment.

compliance_mapping.description: Mapping of de-identification posture to regulatory frameworks (e.g., CPRA, HIPAA).

residual_risk.description: Residual re-identification risk after applied techniques.
